content: quote: Originally posted by karlhungusjr: quote: But, what this freak is suggesting is just plain wrong. I THINK she may have been suggesting that tongue in cheek. maybe. If not it was a down right stupid idea. No, she is completely serious and now she's in a position to shape the course our nation takes. In her own words: "At this moment in history, I can't imagine anything more rewarding than being part of the new team that's shaping U.S. policy." She goes on the yammer about how such a bailout would allow "robust and independent reporting and commentary", something that would be a neat trick since we don't seem to have it now.
